# size

**Instance Property**

The screen size, measured in pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
var size: CGSize { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property represents the size of the underlying display buffer.

## Accessing the screen mode attributes

- **pixelAspectRatio**: The aspect ratio of a single pixel.
